mapper.select: select mm.user_id as user_id, mm.meeting_member_id as member_id, mm.role as member_role from meeting_member mm left join users u on u.user_id = mm.user_id where mm.meeting_id = #{meetingId} and mm.user_id = #{userId}

select mm.meeting_member_id as members_member_id, u.user_id as members_user_id, u.nickname as members_nickname, u.profile_image_url as members_profile_image_url, mm.role as members_member_role from meeting_member mm left join users u on mm.user_id = u.user_id where mm.meeting_id = #{meetingId} order by u.nickname
